content.question: The graph of <math alttext="f double prime" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mo>â€³</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></math>, the second derivative of the continuous function <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, is shown above on the interval <math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 9, close bracket " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. On this interval <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has only one critical point, which occurs at <math alttext="x equals 6 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following statements is true about the function <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> on the interval <math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 9, close bracket " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has a relative minimum at <math alttext="x equals 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> but not an absolute minimum.

The absolute minimum of <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is at <math alttext="x equals 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has a relative maximum at <math alttext="x equals 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> but not an absolute maximum.

The absolute maximum of <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is at <math alttext="x equals 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The absolute minimum of <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is at <math alttext="x equals 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
